boardgame.name: Baseball All-stars by Strat-o-matic
Strat-O-Matic Baseball
boardgame.description: An iconic major league baseball game that is so well known that it is exhibited in the National Baseball Hall of Fame. The game is conducted with pitcher and batter cards constructed with statistical probabilities so they realistically reproduce the real-life performance of each player for the season represented. The gamer is placed in the role of the manager and/or general manager of a team and controls the batting order, the choice of a starting pitcher, game strategies (hit and run, steals, intentional walks, bunting, positioning of infielders, pinch hitters, defensive substitutions, pitching changes, etc.). If a full season is played, the game produces amazingly realistic statistics at the player, team, and league levels. The game comes in two versions: a cards and dice version that has been around since 1962 and a computer version that automatically looks up play outcomes and compiles player, team and league statistics. Every year, Strat-O-Matic releases new player card sets based on the previous baseball season, seasons past, and some _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;greats_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; collections._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

This is the Gold Box Hall of Fame Collection version with stats for 1998. The box is a little worn on the right side, and a little crushing damage on the very top. Still the game cards were punched out and other than that it looks great!

2004 Roster, Gold Box 3 Games in 1, Hall of Fame Edition. Game is complete, unplayed and unpunched, roster cards are still sealed in shrink. Box has minor shelf wear on edges, a few small ink lines that are in one spot on box top(all would fit under a quarter), and a 2 to 3_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; split in the side seam of the bottom of the box (located about 2_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; from corner). Box is still very sturdy and in overall good condition. Shipping is UPS Ground with insurance and tracking for $8.50 to USA lower 48. All other locations please contact for cost.
This is the newest version of the game, and the deluxe edition with all of the teams. The box is slightly bowed, and there is some wear on the box. Shipping is 10 to US and 15 to Canada.

This is for an *almost* complete set of 1997 Strat-O-Matic All-Star player cards. The cards are in superb condition. These are full color, very nice looking cards. Players include: American League : Roberto Alomar, Sandy Alomar, Brady Anderson, Albert Belle, Jeff Cirillo, Roger Clemens, David Cone, Joey Cora, Jason Dickson, Nomar Garciaparra, Ken Griffey Jr., Pat Hentgen, Randy Johnson, Dave Justice, Jimmy Key, Chuck Knoblauch, Edgar Martinez, Tino Martinez, Mark McGwire, Mike Mussina, Randy Myers, Paul O_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;Neill, Cal Ripken, Mariano Rivera, Alex Rodriguez, Ivan Rodriguez, Jose Rosado, Frank Thomas, Jim Thome, Justin Thompson and Bernie Williams. National League : Moises Alou, Jeff Bagwell, Rod Beck, Craig Biggio, Jeff Blauser, Barry Bonds, Royce Clayton, Shawn Estes, Steve Finley, Andres Galarraga, Tom Glavine, Mark Grace, Charles Johnson, Bobby Jones, Chipper Jones, Darryl Kile, Ray Lankford, Barry Larkin, Kenny Lofton, Javier Lopez, Greg Maddux, Pedro Martinez, Mike Piazza, Curt Schilling, Larry Walker and Tony Womack. Missing : (All from National League) Kevin Brown, Ken Caminiti, Tony Gwynn, Todd Hundley and Denny Neagle. U.S. buyers can pay with Google Checkout, Paypal, money orders or checks. Shipping is $5. International buyers must use Google Checkout or Paypal. Shipping depends on location.

Strat-o-Matic Hall of Fame Edition (2004) from Strat-o-Matic Game Co. ***Please be advised that there are no player cards included - this is for the game components only!*** Box: Light shelf wear with a few very minor dings and wrinkles. Overall the box is in excellent+ condition! Contents: As stated, there are no player cards included. Here_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s what you DO get: Full-color cardboard field mat, Advanced Strategy Chart, Advanced Fieldin Chart, Basic Fielding Chart, a few copies of the two different scoresheet types (ready for photocopying), 8 Pitcher_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Hitting Cards (unpunched!), 4-page Hall of Fame 2000 list of players, Strat-o-Matic Game Catalog, Order form to get your personalized cards (!), 2003 Season Super-Advanced Weather Effects Chart, 2003 Ball Park Effect Charts, Super-Advanced Fielding Chart, Super-Advanced Miscellaneous Charts, Rule Book and season clarifications page, 6-page S-o-M Baseball Order form, Flyer for S-o-M Tournament Info, 2003 Additional Players Roster sheet, 16-page Rule Book, 1 d20, 3d6, 4 tokens forbaserunners, rubber bands. Everything is in new, unplayed condition! SHIPPING U.S. shipping will be via USPS Priority Shipping and based on a weight of 3 Lbs. International buyers are very welcome, but please contact me for a shipping price quote to avoid any surprises or misunderstandings.

Five classic teams: 1927 Yankees (the Babe!), 1934 Cardinals, 1961 Tigers (Al Kaline), 1962 Giants (Willie Mays), 1980 Blue Jays (OK Blue Jays, they’re not quite up there with the rest). The cards are Very Good to Like New, without any markings: only played a few times. 20 cards per team, 100 total (2 photocopies in Jays deck). $20, PayPal $22. This is NOT the entire game, just cards.
